indexes.indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX account_pkey ON public.account USING btree (fch__partyid)
CREATE INDEX idx_account_account_number_trgm ON public.account USING gin (account__number gin_trgm_ops)
CREATE INDEX idx_account_name_btree ON public.account USING btree (name)
CREATE INDEX idx_account_name_trgm ON public.account USING gin (name gin_trgm_ops)
CREATE INDEX idx_account_primary_city ON public.account USING btree (upper((primary__address ->> 'city'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_account_primary_country ON public.account USING btree (upper((primary__address ->> 'country'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_account_primary_state ON public.account USING btree (upper((primary__address ->> 'state'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_account_primary_street ON public.account USING btree (upper((primary__address ->> 'street'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_account_primary_zip ON public.account USING btree (upper((primary__address ->> 'postalCode'::text)))

CREATE INDEX idx_case_drafts_case_type ON public.case_drafts USING btree (case_type)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cases_pkey ON public.cases USING btree (case_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_account_id ON public.cases USING btree (account_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_account_status ON public.cases USING btree (account_id, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_case_data ON public.cases USING gin (case_data)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_case_data_external_status ON public.cases USING btree ((((case_data -> 'case'::text) ->> 'ExternalCaseStatus'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_case_data_status ON public.cases USING btree ((((case_data -> 'case'::text) ->> 'Status'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_case_type ON public.cases USING btree (case_type)
CREATE INDEX idx_cases_part_number ON public.cases USING btree (part_number)

CREATE INDEX idx_cases_synced_at ON public.cases USING btree (synced_at DESC)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX contact_pkey ON public.contact USING btree (email)

CREATE INDEX idx_contact_firstname_trgm ON public.contact USING gin (first__name gin_trgm_ops)
